title: Summoner Name not Available
body: i want to change my summoner name to something, but when i enter it says not available. I would be fine with that but when i search that name it shows that no one has that name in NA. How can i fix this or at least see if the name is actually taken.

replies.body: It's possible that the summoner name you're trying to use has a word within it that is being caught by the filter. What's the summoner name that you're trying to take?
